predicate.note: Frames file for 'staff' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.8.

roleset.name: provide manpower

example.name: all args
example.text: To help residents in Northern California rebuild, FEMA intends to set up 17 disaster assistance offices in the earthquake area in the next several days and *trace* to staff them with 400 to 500 workers from various agencies, said Robert Volland, chief of the agency's individual assistance division.

example.name: active, worker in subject pos
example.text: To the extent we lack manpower *trace* *trace* to staff menial jobs in hospitals, ...

example.name: passive, worker in demoted subject pos
example.text: The Sidley-Ashurst venture will also be staffed *trace* by another Sidley partner specializing in corporate law, a partner from Ashurst concentrating on acquisitions and a Japanese attorney.
example.arg: another Sidley partner specializing in corporate law, a partner from Ashurst concentrating on acquisitions and a Japanese attorney

example.name: with job and agency
example.text: John works hard *trace* to staff the various cafeterias he's in charge of.
example.arg: the various cafeterias he's in charge of

roleset.note: VERY IMPORTANT to distinguish between the staff working and the entity which causes those staff to work! Be very careful!
